description.h2: Element xsd:schema must not contain any occurrences of "embedded" linkbases.
description.p: REMARK: This applies only to company extension schemas. In principle a standard taxonomy is allowed to have an embedded linkbase. But there is no such standard taxonomy and therefore no such test variation.
REMARK: there are no variations for linkbases other than link:labelLink, but the rule does apply to all of them.
